column4: Hi. Today I have to change my 80 GB HD for one which is 380GB. Is there are way of transfering my whole operating system to the new one or is it best to do a fresh install ?
you can mount the second hard disk, copy the whole file systems across (boot from a cd) and then just re-install grub onto the new hard disk
some minor changes such as the fstab, but yes
hateball's suggestion is much better though
